name: Mushy Plague
description:
You're the last standing plague doctor in London while the plague infests in the forest. Your job is to eliminate the virus in the forest to stop the spread of this virus before London gets wiped out.

This is a game made for the Quarantine Game Jam in relation to the COVID-19 or corona-virus to support Italian Hospitals. The theme for this game jam was  "a lot of..." What we've went for is a lot of the deception of game cover expectation. This was a two man team to put our skills and abilities within a time limit of 3 days  to the test.

This game most likely won't be developed further as it was made to simply test ourselves in the game jam's time limit. 

Make sure to protect yourself against this virus by following all hygiene, social distancing, stocking up practices from the World Health Organisation to reduce your chance to catch the virus or spreading the virus. You can also donate to the World Health Organisation for research into fighting and understanding the virus and development of a vaccine if you wish to.
